title: 1 injured in accidental shooting
content:
MERIDIAN, Miss. (WTOK) - Police are investigating a shooting that happened Sunday night.
They say It happened just after 7 o'clock Sunday evening in the 1600 block of 20th street. Sergeant Dareall Thompson says two people were walking down the street when one accidentally shot the other.
Police say the person that was shot was hit in the leg and will be okay. The shooting victim was transported by a personal car to the hospital.
